task.title: Lifting and blocking the pallet truck

step.cmd: See SAFETY / Control of Hazardous Energy / Lockout/Tagout Procedures to prepare the pallet truck for maintenance.
Remove the battery. See SAFETY / Control of Hazardous Energy / Battery Removal and Installation.

See Figure 3. Lift the power unit end (1) with a hydraulic jack (2) and put two hardwood blocks (3) or two jack stands (4) below the pallet truck skirt. Make sure that you set the hydraulic jack to the applicable height, which is no more than 400 mm (16 in).

Lift the forks (5) with a lifting device (6). When using hardwood blocks (3), put one below the forks and one below the center of the battery compartment (7). When using jack stands (4), put two below the forks and two below each side of the battery compartment.
